item.title: We're on Steam!
item.description:
You can now wishlist Mythic Ocean on Steam!

We’ve also released our first full trailer for the game! You can watch it on Steam or on Youtube:

item.title: Mythic Ocean
item.description: BEFRIEND THE GODS MAKE CHOICES THAT SHAPE THE COSMOS Narrative Exploration - through deep conversations with gods, your choices influence the fate of the universe. Diverse, peaceful underwater environments Meet tons of goofy, charming creatures No death, no combat, no failure. The challenge is influencing the gods to get the result you want - outcomes range between harmony and pandemonium. There's a breakdancing crab.

item.title: Announcing Mythic Ocean
item.description:
For the past year, Paralune has been hard at work on a game.

Keeping it a secret has been tough. So far we’ve focused on proving out our ideas and teaching ourselves all the necessary skills to make it happen, but now we’re finally ready to share our first project: Mythic Ocean.

Here’s a brief teaser video:

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: We were brought together by a shared desire to tell interactive stories. We want our games to be accessible yet mysterious, with a strong emotional impact and an experience unique to each player.

item.title: About
item.description: Paralune is a 3-person game studio in Austin, TX, founded in 2016 with the purpose of creating emotional stories with deep interactivity. Exploring the thoughts and feelings of the characters in our games is our focus, and players will be asked to make choices that have real consequences. Our players are storytellers, too. Our first title is currently unannounced and in development, so follow us on social media to get regular updates.

item.title: Jobs
item.description: We don’t have any open positions right now, but in the future they’ll be posted on this page. Regardless, we would love to hear from you – just send your resume (and website/portfolio if applicable) to contact@paralune.com.
